artist: Engraver: William Holl (the younger); Printer: After Francesco Rosaspina; Painter: After Raphael (Raffaello Sanzio or Santi); Publisher: Charles Knight
description: bust length portrait of a man with long hair and beard, facing right and looking out at viewer; wearing white shirt with gathered neckline
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscriptions

 in image: RAIMONDI. | below image in black: Engraved by W. Holl / Marc Antonio Raimondi. / From a print by Rosaspina after a picture by Raphael / Under th Superintendence of the Society for the Diffusion of Useful Knowledge. / London, Published by Charles Knight, Ludgate Street / Proof  | on sheet in pencil: 2-264 | on mount in pencil: 264
title: Portrait of Raimondi
